text:
Raskolnikov stood beside Sonia, watching. 

Pyotr Petrovitch entered, ignoring him. 

"Excuse me," he said, addressing everyone. 

"Amalia Ivanovna, please listen. Sofya Ivanovna," he continued, eyes on Sonia. 

She looked alarmed. 

"A hundred-rouble note is missing from my table. 

If you know where it is, tell us. 

If not, I will take serious measures." 

Silence filled the room. 

Sonia turned pale, unable to speak. 

Luzhin stared at her. 

"Well, how is it to be then?" he asked.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch accuses Sonia of stealing a hundred-rouble note, threatening serious consequences if she does not confess.
